item.title: UW News • Football: Wisconsin falls at Minnesota in season finale
item.description: The Wisconsin Badgers (4-8) fell to the Minnesota Golden Gophers (7-5) by a 17-7 score Saturday evening to wrap up the 2025 season.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: No. 10 Badgers complete regular season in emphatic fashion
item.description: MINNEAPOLIS, Minn. - The No. 10 Wisconsin volleyball team dominated in their final showing of the regular season, sweeping No. 18 Minnesota (25-18, 25-18, 25-17) to secure their ninth-straight victory.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: No. 10 Badgers tally eighth-straight victory
item.description: EVANSTON, Ill. - The No. 10 Wisconsin volleyball team notched its eighth victory in a row by defeating Northwestern on the road in four sets (25-18, 25-22, 20-25, 25-22) to kick off the final week of the regular season.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: No. 10 Badgers enter final week of regular season
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - The No. 10 Wisconsin women's volleyball team is back on the road for the final week of the regular season, as they prepare to take on Northwestern on Wednesday, Nov. 26 and No. 18 Minnesota on Friday, Nov. 28.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Fuerbringer Tabbed B1G Setter of the Week
item.description: MADISON, Wis. – For the fourth time this season, and in back-to-back weeks, Wisconsin volleyball's Charlie Fuerbringer has been named Big Ten Setter of the Week.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Drafted: Badger Duo Head to Dallas
item.description: MADISON, Wis. – Mimi Colyer and Carter Booth of the Wisconsin volleyball team were drafted by the Dallas Pulse of the inaugural season of Major League Volleyball, announced Monday. Colyer was drafted No. 1 overall, while Booth was drafted as the 19th overall pick.

item.title: UW News • Women's Basketball: Wisconsin remains undefeated at home with 81-63 win over Detroit Mercy
item.description: The Badgers claim best start since 2018-19

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: No. 10 Badgers soar past Hawkeyes
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - The No. 10 Wisconsin volleyball team stifled Iowa in their final home regular season match of the year, defeating the Hawkeyes in straight sets (25-17, 25-15, 25-19) on Senior Day.

item.title: UW News • Football: Wisconsin takes down No. 21 Illinois on senior day
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - The Wisconsin Badgers scored another ranked win at Camp Randall, taking down No. 21 Illinois on Senior Night, 27-10. Wisconsin was led by 131 rushing yards from Darrion Dupree and a stout defensive effort, holding off the Fighting Illini to secure a pair of wins over ranked opponents for the first time in a single season since 2019.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: No. 10 Badgers look to Senior Day
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - The No. 10 Wisconsin women's volleyball team will play their final home match of the regular season against Iowa on Sunday, Nov. 23—hosting Senior Day to honor Carter Booth, Mimi Colyer, Alicia Andrew and Jada Cergnilia.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: No. 10 Badgers derail No. 11 Boilermakers
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - The No. 10 Wisconsin volleyball team continued it's winning ways, this time sweeping No. 11 Purdue (26-24, 25-15, 25-17) at the UW Field House to secure their sixth-straight victory.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Colyer and Fuerbringer Collect Conference Weekly Awards
item.description: MADISON, Wis. – For the third time this season, No. 10 Wisconsin volleyball's Mimi Colyer and Charlie Fuerbringer have been named Big Ten Player of the Week and conference Setter of the Week, announced by the Big Ten Monday afternoon.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: No. 10 Badgers welcome No. 11 Boilermakers
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - The No. 10 Wisconsin women's volleyball team is back in action on Wednesday, Nov. 19 to take on No. 11 Purdue at the UW Field House. First serve is set for 7:30 p.m. CT and will be televised on Big Ten Network. Wednesday's match will be the annual White Out Game in Madison.
